# Slip Between Sight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Figment Spells|figment]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** One standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level 

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 75

This illusion obscures accurate vision. You gain a +5 bonus to [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] and do not necessarily need something to hide behind (but you must be unobserved while initially hiding). This spell negates any size penalties as they apply to [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks.
